title: Muddler Scripts Schema
description: Schema for Mudlet scripts described in scripts.json.

isActive.description: Yes if this script will automatically load, no otherwise.

isFolder.description: Yes if this is a folder, no otherwise.

eventHandlerList.description: List of Mudlet events this script handles (e.g. sysInstall).

children.description: Nested scripts when used as a folder (isFolder=yes).
